122463.各家の 扉メニューに 家具と庭具を\n２００種類まで 収納できる\n『家具＆庭具:
In the door menu of each house, you'll find a "Furniture and Garden Storage Area" where you can store up to 200 different pieces of
furniture and garden tools. You can access it from the garden or from inside the house, and you can store furniture, garden tools, house
kits... The furniture, garden tools, and house kits can be stored... Furniture, garden tools, and house kits are limited to a
maximum of 99 pieces per type, and you can't store more than 100 of the same type...
